title: This new AMD feature can boost your games with one click
description: AMD's upcoming Hypr-RX seems like an easy solution for optimized gaming on a Radeon graphics card.

title: There’s a Clippy ugly holiday sweater — and it’s awesome
description: Clippy has returned in the form of an ugly Christmas sweater.

title: The idea for AMD’s next-gen GPUs all started on a napkin
description: AMD experts talked about the creation of the upcoming Radeon RX 7900 XTX. The GPU lineup had very small beginnings.
